price: This is a reminder. And the righteous will surely have a good return:
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
